text: Jealousy () is a 1953 Italian drama film directed by Pietro Germi. It is based on the novel Il marchese di Roccaverdina by Luigi Capuana. == Cast == *Erno Crisa: Baron Antonio *Marisa Belli: Agrippina Solmo *Alessandro Fersen: Don Silvio *Liliana Gerace: Countess Zosima *Vincenzo Musolino: Farmer Rocco *Grazia Spadaro: Mamma Grazia *Paola Borboni: Aunt Baroness *Giovanni Martella: Salvatore *Gustavo Serena: Doctor *Maresa Gallo: Santa ==References== ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:Italian drama films Category:1953 drama films Category:Italian films Category:Films directed by Pietro Germi Category:Films scored by Carlo Rustichelli
title: Jealousy (1953 Italian film)
